participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious about different cultures, with a love for culinary experiences.
participant_1.background: i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it. i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.

participant_2.name: Evelyn
participant_2.personality: Wise and nostalgic, with a vibrant spirit that embraces life and its memories.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old.
